title: Replace all ~/.config/ralph/ references with ~/.config/ralphtools/
description:
The codebase has 50+ references to the old path ~/.config/ralph/ but the actual install path is ~/.config/ralphtools/. This causes confusion and broken commands.

Files affected: README.md, SETUP.md, AGENTS.md, ralph.zsh, docs/*.md, skills/**/*.md, tests/*.sh

acceptanceCriteria.text: Replace in ralph.zsh and related scripts
Verify no broken paths remain: grep -r 'config/ralph[^t]'
Commit: fix: BUG-027 update all paths to ~/.config/ralphtools/
